rounds.interlude: Jemima draws a deep breath, straightens her cards, and invites both players to stare down the million.

beats: Jemima wheels out a chrome trolley stuffed with neon groceries.
Each item blinks with dynamic price tags that keep climbing.
She locks the doors and hands the duo holographic calculators.
Only the quickest total can secure dessert for the green room.
questions: Six price-surge tins jump from £3 each to £3.50 mid-scan; what is the new combined cost in pounds?
A crate shows 16 glowing limes sold at 4 for £5. Buying the whole crate earns a 20% discount on the subtotal—what do you pay in pounds?
